scripts.start:backend: npm run copy-env:backend && cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: npm run copy-env:frontend && cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run copy-env:backend && npm run copy-env:frontend && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c 'blue,magenta' "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
